Sustainability related financial products

ERC-1155

Digitizing “Green Energy” by tokenizing it on a blockchain is

A revolution for the
energy industry

as it unlocks new permissionless and green business models, and powers the upcoming age of
Obviously the Crypto world has been the first to understand this potential, as has been shown by the pioneers at Protocol Labs that partnered with us to help them decarbonize the Filecoin network, helping their miners, known as “Storage Providers”, buy Renewable Energy Certificates, in different regions across the globe

Decarbonizing the Filecoin blockchain

In support of the Crypto Climate Accord (CCA), Protocol Labs and Energy Web showcase an open-source solution for decentralized renewable energy purchasing by crypto miners.
Filecoin storage providers purchased verified renewable energy using Energy Web Zero, a public renewable energy search engine
“We are excited to join the Crypto Climate Accord (cryptoclimate.org) and contribute open-source solutions to the crypto sector. We see various opportunities to enable and incentivize Filecoin storage providers to source their electricity from renewables in a verifiable way”

To help increase the demand for clean energy in one of the dirtiest grids

Renewable energy power plants.
Anna’s simple actions

Boosted the economics of different Renewable energy Power plants

Making it easier for more to be constructed and more quickly decarbonize the global energy system

Digitizing renewables, makes them easier and faster to buy, which as a consequence increases the demand and ultimately drives

More investments in zero-carbon resources
